column5: Just saw in cabelas... Accudepth in size 27 and 47 in lefty...  Wish they did the 17s as well... But this is a step in the right direction...  Btw... They're on sale too.... $55-$60 for most models
That's pretty cool!  Thanks for the info!
Thx for the info. Yes too bad not in smaller size. I bought a okuma Coldwater in a smaller left size and so far so good with it really like it.
